dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare to approach the domain of Frostshade, the Shadow Demon. What brings you to my realm, human?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to learn from your powers.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hah! Mortals always seeking power. I might consider teaching you, but only if you prove your worth.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am willing to undergo any trial you set.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Very well. Prepare yourself for the test of shadows. Survive, and perhaps I shall impart some knowledge to you.
You have shown bravery. I will share a glimpse of my abilities with you. Be grateful, for few survive my tests.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am not afraid. Bring on your test.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words, human. Let us see if you can match your actions to your boasts.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I don't need anything from a creature like you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Insolence! You will regret your disrespect.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize. I didn't mean to offend.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies won't save you now. Prepare to face the consequences of your words.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I stand by my words. Let's see what you can do.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. You have sealed your fate with your arrogance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek an ally in this dangerous realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An ally, you say? What do you offer in return for my cooperation?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My loyalty and assistance whenever you need.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Interesting proposal. I shall observe your actions before deciding whether to grant you my alliance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have nothing to offer but a heartfelt plea.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Sentimentality is useless in this realm. Come back when you have something of value.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am not here to trifle with creatures like you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You dare to insult Frostshade, the Shadow Demon? You will pay dearly for your impudence.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for the offense. I will leave your realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your apology means nothing now. Begone before I decide to eliminate you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not beg forgiveness from the likes of you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Prideful till the end, are we? Very well, face the consequences of your defiance.
